Subject: Internment

    Megatron awoke to a dazed reality. He could feel his arms and legs, and 
everything was blurry. His head felt like a hundred pounds and swayed from 
side to side. He then realized that his body was being suspended from above...
    "What the hell is going on here? I demand to have an explanation.....when 
I get my hands on you-" he yelled until Tarantulas settled into his dazed 
sight of vision, sending shivers down the tyrants spine.
    The scientist cackled, "What hands you you be hurting me with Megatron? 
These?!! Hahahahahahhaha!" He said, and then held up both of his large strong 
arms. The spider then dropped them and showed Megatron his detached legs. All 
the while he was laughing.
    Megatron realized then that all that remained of him was his torso, neck, 
and head. His arms and legs had been detached and he was being suspended in a 
small clear tube. An internment tube.
    "Youre insane!" Megatron yelled as his body swayed back and forth. He 
wasnt happy and wanted to get out. "Let me see Black Aracnia, now!"
    Tarantulas dropped Megatrons limbs to the floor and walked up to the tube 
and looked at Megatron in the eyes. "Youre in no position to make demands. 
Good night Grape Face." He said, turned, and exited the small chamber 
containing the computers that showed Megatrons stats.
    "Well....things have changed, yes." He said to himself looking around his 
new prison.
